title: Cars
description: A cocky race car named Lightning McQueen learns the value of friendship and humility after getting stuck in a small town.

title: Toy Story
description: A group of toys comes to life when humans are not around. Woody, a cowboy, feels threatened by the arrival of a new toy, Buzz Lightyear.

title: Finding Nemo
description: A clownfish named Marlin crosses the ocean in search of his son Nemo, with the help of a forgetful but friendly fish named Dory.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of superheroes tries to live a normal life but is forced back into action when a new threat emerges.

title: Ratatouille
description: Remy, a rat with a talent for cooking, dreams of becoming a chef in Paris and forms an unexpected alliance with a young cook.

title: Up
description: A widowed old man named Carl Fredricksen embarks on a journey in his flying house with an unexpected young explorer.

title: Wall-E
description: In a distant future, a small garbage-collecting robot discovers love and a mission that could save humanity.

title: Coco
description: Miguel, a young music lover, accidentally travels to the Land of the Dead and discovers the truth about his family.

title: Inside Out
description: The story of Riley, a girl guided by her emotions—Joy, Sadness, Fear, Anger, and Disgust—during a major life change.

title: Soul
description: A jazz musician named Joe Gardner has an accident and finds himself in a dimension where souls develop their personalities before birth.
